config.title: Simple Close Button Config
config.option.modEnabled.name: Mod Enabled
config.option.modEnabled.desc: Toggles the entire mod. Idk why you would need this. You could've just not downloaded the mod, but ok. You do you.
config.option.tooltip.name: Tooltip
config.option.tooltip.desc: Toggles the tooltip when hovering over the close button.
config.group.creativeInventory.name: Creative Inventory
config.group.creativeInventory.desc: Settings for the close button in the creative inventory.
config.group.creativeInventory.option.to: Toggles the close button in the creative inventory.
config.group.creativeInventory.option.po: Position of the close button on the horizontal axis.
Position of the close button on the vertical axis.

Position of the close button on the vertical axis.
